attributes.action: ensure that all serving politicians must use the NHS and state education system for themselves and their families. While serving they do not have the choice of private education or healthcare.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before any politician can stand for election they must sign an agreement that if they are elected they will not, while in service, use private education or healthcare. They will not be able to jump any queues or waiting list or receive preferential treatment. And they must use their local state school for their children's education.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
